game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: In a forgotten land, an artifact of great power is said to be concealed within the ruins of an old civilization. Uncover its location and bring it back to the quest giver.
game.reward: 100 gold coins and a legendary weapon

task.description: Talk to villagers in the nearby settlement to gather clues about the ruins' location.
Bypass or defeat the guardians that protect the entrance to the ruins.
Navigate through the maze-like ruins, avoiding traps and solving puzzles, to locate the ancient artifact.
